website_summaries.verdict: You will be getting a good value on this heat-resistant apron, which offers the advantages of leather and a comfortable fit.
pros: Nice quality leather – not too thick, not too thin
Heat resistant, made for welding, but great for a lot of shop applications
Strap design helps keep the weight off your neck, making it very comfortable
cons: This apron is very long, which offers less range of motion than others on the market, however the length makes it very protective

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good quality; fits 6’ 7” and big.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy how this purchase turned out, and impressed with the quality. I’m really tall and have a 46” waist and there was still ajustment enough so that it fit very well. Leather is thick, but still supple. This apron is hands down way better quality than you would get at the local HF, where I almost bought a cheaper quality apron. That one was thinner and less expensive, and overall smaller. I think this is a great compromise between that poor quality one, and the very expensive high end ones.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Ripley

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent deal. Prefect stitching, lots of good size pockets with an easy adjustable strap, no more hanging from my neck, and thick leather also offers good protection while working. Good quality and price
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great apron very useful both blacksmithing and in my Woodshop ...
customer_reviews.text: Great apron very useful both blacksmithing and in my Woodshop carving I have purchased two one for my son and one for myself he uses his in the blacksmith area at Boy Scout camp small issues with some seams on one pocket but easily fixed would give them a positive recommendation arrived on time and price to sell just wanted to update been using them for over a year now they've held up great recommend them highly
customer_reviews.author: David Beebe

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like the coverage this apron provides for me. I am 6' tall 225 lbs and it fits great. The leather is soft and the stitching is quality. I have a smaller apron i purchased from HF and this is a far superior product. There is a less expensive one on Amazon, but this one is 6" longer and covers to the middle of my shins. it also covers a few inches below my knees when i am sitting down. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kesler

customer_reviews.title: Good thick apron
customer_reviews.text: Good thick apron, the pockets are awesome and the price is good. The only reason I'm taking a star off is its fairly hard to get on because the plastic buckle in the back is relatively cheap and hard to connect behind your back (its like plugging in a USB connector, you have to try 3 times to get the orientation right). A slightly nicer one that's easier to manipulate blind would have been worth a bit of extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Varsanyi

customer_reviews.title: I found the front pocket and durable leather material so nice! It was heavy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas present for a beginner blacksmith. Before this, he often singed his clothes and scrambled to find his tools. I found the front pocket and durable leather material so nice! It was heavy, but in a good way. I knew that he'd be able to work in it without feeling too weighed down. The adjustable back is great and it's already being put to good use! The smile on his face made the purchase that much better!
customer_reviews.author: Boom Dynamite

customer_reviews.title: Very acceptable weight of leather.
customer_reviews.text: So far in 2 uses the length is very useful when sitting and keeping spatter off. Im hoping the stitching is really heat resistant being that its single stitched. Yes this apron is an initially very fragrant item but manning up with the fumes covers it. Chinese made but... it works. Harness/straps are a bit complicated, especially if they drift a little. Going to have the wife throw a few stitches on the cross points to hold it. All good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A Voltrade

customer_reviews.title: Great apron for the money. 6'7 240#s
customer_reviews.text: Great apron, I'm 6'7" 240lbs, seems to cover the basics. I like the pockets, it has a nice weight for being thin leather. Much cheaper than making it myself.
customer_reviews.author: J&K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent welding apron
customer_reviews.text: This thing is GREAT for welding (or just about anything you might want a protective apron for). It's very comfortable. It's very sturdy and well made. It's easy to don/doff. There is one problem. it stinks. Literally. It stinks a LOT. I had to put it outside for two months to get the smell down to a level where it was tolerable. I'm not sure if it came from the leather curing or from something else during manufacture but it was REALLY bad. Still, now that I've gotten rid of the smell, I really like the apron. Way more sturdy than the crummy ones they sell at harbor freight.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carpenter apron for my husband who is 6 ft and wears 2x shirts. The fit was perfect. I was concerned about the weight on his neck but the straps have a mechanism which can be adjusted which keeps the pressure off the neck. One gift he actual uses.
customer_reviews.author: grandma Ann

customer_reviews.title: Nice apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron is great. Very supple. Some people have complained about the smell. It just smells like leather to me. The odor on my disapated pretty quickly. It is pretty long on me (I'm only 5'8" in my old age), but it is not awkward. I would definitely buy it again, but I would probably opt for the 36" version.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice pockets, bad stitching
customer_reviews.text: Long apron with an excellent pocket layout. The phone pocket securely holds an iPhone X in a case. If the leather is wet from sweat be sure to face the phone away from your body or it will butt dial your emergency contact list. The back straps are comfortable and easy to put on and adjust. I've had the apron for 2 months and my only complaint is that the threads that hold the pockets on have failed. Reattached with clear Gorilla glue and am going to add more rivets. Stronger thread or better tie off procedures should have been used at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Crash Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: A strudy welding or shop apron
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a good shop apron for a while - I weld and do woodwork, and am constantly looking for tools that I'd like to be able to keep on my person while working. This apron fits very well, and the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was that the cross support in the back is a little too loose to maintain its position. I really like that the straps cross, but I keep having to adjust the "keeper" when I put it on. If there was a little more tension in it, or a slide that locks in place, it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Carter

customer_reviews.title: its all quality leather except for the straps in the back...its just cheap nylon with a plastic clip
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the strap in the back, its working for now, but its just one of those cheap plastic clips you find on backpacks. But as far as the apron fits its really good, I'm a large guy with 46" shoulders and a bigger belly and this fits me great, and at 5'10" it hangs down past my knees even. I'm no expert in leather stitching but it all seems good to me so far, I've only been using it for a week though, plenty of pockets to hold tools, its comfortable, the apron seems like its good leather so I'm sure it will hold up except for that clip in the back.
customer_reviews.author: James Pann

customer_reviews.title: Quality assembly but a horrible odor
customer_reviews.text: Great quality assembly and plenty of leather to cover me at 6’3” ..... but..... it smells so bad out of the bag i want to pass out. It might as well be a fresh cow hide. I have a migraine from the odor.
customer_reviews.author: NewMidwesterner

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Work Apron
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to receive such a good quality leather apron for a very reasonable price. The fit was good and the straps keep the weight off my neck and distribute it evenly on the shoulders. Nice pockets and and fully adjustable straps.
customer_reviews.author: David Radtke

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, coverage, and durability.
customer_reviews.text: I love it and use it primarily for grilling or around the smoker. It does have a pungent smell to it when it first arrived. I hung it up in my garage and let it air out. Took several weeks but is fine now. I’m sure there is something out there that I could spray it with, either a deodorizer or a leather sealant that would have assisted removing the smell. Although the smell is a negative the function and quality is what I purchased it for. It’s fantastic in comfort and durability which is why the five star is warranted.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Most impressive
customer_reviews.text: I really didnt expect too much with this apron. I bought it simply because if the reviews and the price. I needed it quick. My husband looked shocked when he opened it. He thought I spent alot of money on the apron. He loves it. He is 5' 10" and very muscular. He weighs about 215. It's perfect. It helps with the heat when forging. It has taken alot of burns and can takes years more. I am very impressed. Thank you! I will post a pic soon
customer_reviews.author: mimihornsby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears this every day in his workshop...woods metals, grinding, welding,. He always ruiss his work clothes terribly and this helps keep him cleaner and safer. Thick full grain suede. He did remove the straps and I sewed on some sturdy clip straps in his size that I recycled off a tote so he can take it off quickly. Its longer than most. We ordered the bigger one and it's perfect for my big tall man.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This apron was MUCH better than I expected! Really I was expecting something that could take a couple of sparks from the welder and fail quickly after that. This will last more than a few seasons. The leather is thick and has good coverage. The other thing that is not very well described are the abundant pockets on the front. They pockets multiple sizes, some wide, some small. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super nice leather - not too heavy and plenty long
customer_reviews.text: After wearing out my waxed canvass apron in my wood shop, I decided to try an upgrade to leather. With the low cost of this baby, I was afraid that the quality would be less than ideal. I was wrong. This apron is perfect. Fits like a glove, not too heavy, and the added length is perfect for me at 6' 2". I could not be happier with this apron. Plenty of pocket space, perfectly laid out for all the necessary tools, and super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Odle

customer_reviews.title: Great for welding!
customer_reviews.text: Love this and has saved me from getting alot of burns. I'm a welder and work on trains and am welding in alot of various positions. The leather is good and holds up and is long enough to cover my knees when seated. Only issue is the threading that is used to sew the pockets on burned up and pocket are no longer effective but still a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good, and it covers my entire front from chest to shins. I am 5'11" weighing 175 lbs, with a 42" chest and 33" waste. The straps are pulled pretty far in, so there is a lot of room for growth. I really like the pockets and the solid construction. The stitching looks like it will hold up well. The weight of the leather feels like it will take the work, as my son and I are learning the blacksmith arts.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Waydick

customer_reviews.title: Another use
customer_reviews.text: I resumed smoking cigars, and the cheapos that I bought had a tendency to flake off burning bits of tobacco. Over time, I've burned holes in the carpet and in my sweatpants. So I bought this apron, a welding blanket to cover the couch, and a plastic floor mat to cover the space between the couch and the coffee table. The apron works great, and I haven't burned the place down yet, knock on wood.
customer_reviews.author: Judson T. Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Really well built
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on a whim when Amazon suggested it to me, with low expectations. I was blown away when it arrived. SUPER heavy duty leather, tough construction, and plenty long, which is where a lot of work aprons fall short (pun intended) I expect i'll be using this thing for the rest of my life it is so well built.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Plenty long enough even for tall guys
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pockets and how well it's made. My only complaint is the straps but that's because I'm 6 ft 8, but at least it's long enough for me. I'm going to have to reconfigure the straps a little bit just because they hit me weird, but I was kind of expecting that. All-in-all really well-made and plenty long enough. If the straps were a little more adjustable for somebody 6ft 8in., I would have given it 5 out of 5 stars on everything! Good price!
customer_reviews.author: Brian David Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: This apron is not super thick, but provides a lot of protection
customer_reviews.text: This apron is not super thick, but provides a lot of protection. It is fairly light and easy to wear for long periods of time. The straps are comfortable and it has several useful and well positioned pockets. I use it while I work in my blacksmithing forge. It has saved me from some serious burns several times already.
customer_reviews.author: pepsihatman

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: Fit (mostly) over a heavy jacket while cutting some steel (sparks actually burned a hole in my leather jacket before I put this on). No damage to this (as expected). Planning to use while forging to protect my dangling bits and such. ;) Suspect it will be easier to secure when I'm not wearing five layers, due to single digit (F) temperatures. Will see how well it holds up over the coming months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Us Bigger Guys
customer_reviews.text: A heavy weight apron that has pockets and actually come in men's sizes. At 6' 4" and 255# this apron fits like it was tailor made. Plenty of adjustment, doesn't pull on the back of your neck and has good coverage. Paired it with a set of welding sleeves and I'm all set. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: walla2k5

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: These aprons are unbelievably well made. I did have to buy an extender because I'm a fat kid and they didn't quite fit. I do wish the straps were heavier duty and/or wider. Because it is so heavy and the straps slip and it starts to put pressure on your shoulders. However, I've never worried about getting burned or cut while wearing it. Quality for the price is well worth it. If it ever breaks down I definitely will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Statzer

customer_reviews.title: QeeLink Leather Welding Apron
customer_reviews.text: Its a little short for me and boy does it have a nasty stink to it when you take it out of the package (strongly suggest leave it in the sun for a day or 2) . I haven't used it much to say on the longevity part.
customer_reviews.author: J&J

customer_reviews.title: Buy from Eletecpro instead ***********It is adequate for home
customer_reviews.text: It is adequate for home shop use. Mine arrived missing one rivet backing plate. But it is not bad for the price. But now I see that Eletecpro sells this same item for the same price, but with a pair of gloves. Shoulda, Woulda....
customer_reviews.author: kh

customer_reviews.title: A great apron
customer_reviews.text: This apron offers good coverage and great protection from sparks, embers and sharp corners and objects. I like the fact that you don't have to tie strings behind your back. I ware it for eight hours a day with no fatigue or discomfort
customer_reviews.author: Mike XYZXYZ

customer_reviews.title: Damn nice looking and feeling apron easily adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it last night at dinner time and it arrived today at lunch. It's very sturdily made. The leather is thick enough to withstand abrasions and Heat. Plenty of pockets for tools. I will review the durability later after I've put it through the mill.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Feels good to wear
customer_reviews.text: This is a great apron . Well made and comfortable. The pockets are too convenient though , I keep putting things in them without thought , then look around the work area to find. Great quality for a good price . ULOVE shipped right away and received in a few days . Very happy with purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Rdubya

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick leather.  Great value.  Rich color.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice thick leather and well made. I like the darker color than others I have had. And, better than other brands I have tried too. Easy to put on. I do recommend ordering a size up as it fit a little tight in my regular size and we had to reorder. Otherwise, hard to beat at the price.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight, great length
customer_reviews.text: This apron is a great thickness - not wimpy, and not too heavy. It works well on a man 6'7" for using a propane forge. The pockets were a big tipping point for us buying it, for somewhere to stow tongs in a hurry. We're glad we chose this apron and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Well made durable apron
customer_reviews.text: The apron works well when grinding and welding protecting clothes from sparks. The adjustable straps make it an easy fit and so far have stayed in place. I would recommend this apron.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: QeeLink Leather Welding Apron stitching issue.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this apron Jun 3, 2018 and the stitching started coming out by June 13. I work recovering refrigerant and breaking down appliances for recycle. This has worked well to protect my clothes from oil stains and tears. I have ordered leather cord to try to repair the stitching myself.
customer_reviews.author: DwightT.

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: 100% great. I use this in the steel fabrication industry I am a steel fabricator:Layout/Fitup/welding. This protects me from flames Sparks splatter from welding. It's comfortable to pockets are great. I am 6 foot 2 and it covers me from chest to bottom of kneecap. Love the pockets. Great product
customer_reviews.author: BillH

customer_reviews.title: Leather welding apron! Super quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my son. Who has just started metal working with a forge?. The apron is very well made especially for price... Heavy duty leather that protects his body well. We are very happy with purchase...Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: karen warvi

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT !
customer_reviews.text: This Leather Welding Apron is perfect and provides great protection when you're welding. Shipping and packaging were great !
customer_reviews.author: Kathryne H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this spring of blacksmithing, so it has to stand up to a lot of abuse. It does so flawlessly. It keeps the sparks and share and not metal away from me while remaining adjustable and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: A. Nuran

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy, pretty good all in all.
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I wanted it to do. It's a little tough to put on sometimes, but I think it's much more comfortable to wear for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Jones

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Super nice, way better than I expected. It is long enough to cover the knees!
customer_reviews.author: Bennybaby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grinding and welding.....
customer_reviews.text: I work in a metal shop down in Georgia that doesn't have A/C so purchased this so I wouldn't have to wear full leather coat when grinding and welding.. This apron is a life saver from the ambient heat..
customer_reviews.author: DOB

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you think you actually need it.
customer_reviews.text: Very good stuff, it's all black and brown from blacksmithing now. I will probably be using this smelly thing for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and tough
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband to work in our brewery. It’s perfect - looks great, is comfortable and very sturdy. It’s long and there are plenty of pockets for storage, yet he says it does not weigh him down or feel too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S. Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leather
customer_reviews.text: Excellent leather well made my only critique is the straps melt with weld spatter. However for the price it's awesome I wear it 9 hours per day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its great and very well priced.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice apron high quality very well priced it saves my clothes from burn holes very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: ronald flart

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I really really like the apron. I just wish the straps were removable, the clasp wasn't plastic and I wish there was a loop to hang it from. But, those are small issues, great apron.
customer_reviews.author: nick faz

customer_reviews.title: Stinky! But otherwise good product
customer_reviews.text: The apron seems fairly good quality for the price. I give it four stars because it really does stink when you open it and take it out of the bag. I assume it’s from the tanning process which is a given considering it is a leather product. Other than that you just need to air it out outside for a couple of days and you should be good to go. Overall construction seems good. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Great blacksmithing apron
customer_reviews.text: Great apron, my wife uses it for blacksmithing. The length is a little long/confining around her legs at the bottom and she plans to split the bottom section up the middle so she has better movement, though she likes the full coverage. She says it has awesome pockets, stays put when tightened up and it doesn't pull on her neck. Total win.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R. Lusk

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Weight
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a co-worker, he loves it other then the weight giving him a sore neck the first day he wore it which he said, just like a new pair of shoes it takes a breaking period to get use to.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeta in NH

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: I’m a maker, welder, fabricator, handyman. I do it all and I do it while wearing this apron. It’s very high quality and has stood up to everything I do and protects the clothes underneath. Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: JellyMczach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never had a apron made like this and I love it. No more hanging from my neck, good job.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Jack

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fits perfect thick and very good stitching u can tell it will last for a long time to come but when the time comes I’ll order another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apron
customer_reviews.text: Good apron. Has lots of pockets and it kinda soft strangly enough. But works fine to block heat and hold tools. I use it at my forge and is perfect. The crossed straps on the back was alittle weird at first but was fine once i got used to it. Worth the money. I accidentally ordered one size too big but its not even a problem really it still works fine
customer_reviews.author: Justin A.

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as needed. Provided protection when handling high heat products
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: Leather With Nylon Webbing
customer_reviews.text: This is a bargain for the price. It has two pockets in the front. It covers me from upper chest to knees. The leather is a good thickness; not too heavy for Texas heat.
customer_reviews.author: M. W. Paulson

customer_reviews.title: It holds up.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality apron for the price. If you want a better leather apron you're going to pay over 200 bucks, and that's ok if that's what you want. I've been forging and I like the deep pockets. They hold gloves, tongs. Hammer, etc. You may not want to load down the pockets because that could potentially add weight and strain to the stitching. However, it's much better than a Harbor Freight apron. Besides, if it gives out you'll have some good leather to craft with.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Unbearable Stench
customer_reviews.text: The smell was so bad that I threw up when I opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: Lazuruspit

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heavy leather
customer_reviews.text: This apron is nice and long, very nice heavy leather. I use it when I am turning wood on my lathe. It does an excellent job of keeping all the chips out of my cloths and pockets. Also if a chip comes off hard it offers some protection from injury.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Pender

customer_reviews.title: Not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Better than the one I previously bought but also more expensive. This one has nice hems on the outer portion to prevent tearing. Which is why I took a chance on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my husband for Father's Day when he opened up the box, he was so happy he tried it on and it fit just right. wonderful material very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxs

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your money
customer_reviews.text: I love it it is a great product and a great value and it works exactly as it is designed 😀
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: for welding in a machine shop
customer_reviews.text: This apron was a gift to my friend who welds in a machine shop. He liked it very much - both from styling and durability standpoints.
customer_reviews.author: Otey3832

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: As a taller man (6' 4" and 225 pounds), I am not used to products like this fitting very well. This apron is awesome! I love the fit and the pockets! I think it looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Doc M Savage

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great for those wanting one that does not put all the weight on the back of the neck.
customer_reviews.author: T. Starkey

customer_reviews.title: The fit is really good on a larger guy like myself (6'2"
customer_reviews.text: The fit is really good on a larger guy like myself (6'2", 310 lbs) with the bottom of the apron going slightly past my knees. The back strapping could be a bit wider in my opinion but it's pretty comfortable and has plenty of pockets for anything you might need to keep readily handy.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to present this to my son-in-law
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a son-in-law. I was immediately impressed when I opened the shipping box. The weight of the product was impressive and the color was a rich copper. I immediately felt a surge of excitement to present it to him. He loved it and commented that it was much more heavy duty than the one he had been using. I would recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Robin E. Stringer

customer_reviews.title: My husband was very pleased with this gift
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very pleased with this gift. It’s very hard to find something he doesn’t actually have, this item was really good quality and he liked the pockets
customer_reviews.author: mlsjc22

customer_reviews.title: Actual leather!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money, good quality and exactly as described, nice leather.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hall

customer_reviews.title: Works well for Forging knives
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6’1” and the apron is below his knees. He is learning how to forge knives and is working around very hot metal and flames so far he hasn’t had any issues with not being able to move in it and he likes the safety it gives him when he’s pounding on the metal to shape it.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle W.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality apron
customer_reviews.text: It’s not flimsy, good solid feel when you wear it. Adjusting the straps takes a little getting use to.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is the way to go if you are looking for a leather shop apron. All the good things others have said about it are true.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Always buy leather
customer_reviews.text: Much better than my old denim apron it would always catch fire when grinding or welding It is perfect. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: kenneth pearson

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used for 2 weeks. Seems to be very well constructed. Heavy duty leather but very pliable. My only complaint would be the straps. They are not very comfortable but for the price I would say its a great product. Only time will tell about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E Roden

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband, he is very pleased with the quality. It appears to be durable and it shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mann

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Nice quality. Bought this after my jacket caught fire while smithing. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Mac

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice supple heavy leather. Nice stitching. Rivets. Happy. Easy on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Very prompt shipping and great product!
customer_reviews.text: This apron was a huge hit for my brother! He’s a metal worker, so he was thrilled with the quality, comfort of the size to fit straps, but the pockets and overal length were by far his favorite highlights! You made me a hero at the birthday party with this gift! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lyddie Mae

customer_reviews.title: Good for big/tall held up great to coal forge work (can transfer some color onto lighter clothes)
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for big and tall (really both). It is heavy, but the weight added a feeling of security while blacksmithing. I does a good job keeping loose coals, embers, and forge scale off. Like many tanned products, it does bleed a bit of color so wear it with darker clothes, but the discoloration seems to wash off the easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great Product 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: Just what Ive been looking for in a protective apron. Great value and seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Howard Butler

customer_reviews.title: Look like a very well made shop apron
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the strap adjust the fit of the apron. The length is longer than most and this is good for me. Looks well made, just got see how well it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, comfortable, and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for knifemaking. I wear it when grinding blades and it helps not get metal stuck in my clothes. Also it is very protective when using my homemade forge for heat treating. It’s very comfortable and also got plenty of pockets too. 10/10 I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: seth lanier

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad and straps suck
customer_reviews.text: Apron covers the front of me nicely but smells pretty bad. The straps I find an after thought and for me is not user friendly
customer_reviews.author: E. Pfeil

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Apron arrived today with a stain on it as well as a hole in one of the pockets. Contacted Amazon for a replacement. I will update my review after the replacement arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Will Fearns

customer_reviews.title: Protection from the slag nd comfort.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little difficult to put on but it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bayless

customer_reviews.title: Nice apron.
customer_reviews.text: The stars tell the tale. Only "issue" is it smells funny when first out of the bag. Air it out overnight and it's fine. Howzat for picking nit?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less than 30 days - START WEARING AT SEAMS
customer_reviews.text: starting to wear/come apart at the seam near the top shoulder - coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Dianna S.

customer_reviews.title: Really get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Heavy, quality materials used. Very pleased. Good product for the price !
customer_reviews.author: Willow A.

customer_reviews.title: VERY HEFTY AND DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy sewing, and takes a beating from flying metal, and fire.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Pelley

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my welder son. He says it works great and is happy w/ it
customer_reviews.author: R. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with the thickness and quality at such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it should fit the bill
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Xmas gift for my son in law. He said he really liked it but hasn’t really used it yet. Will update if he has any issues. Shipping was good and fast, and price was competitive.
customer_reviews.author: BTW

customer_reviews.title: Definitely heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little heavy but other than that it’s a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer!

customer_reviews.title: My Son Will Love It
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a Christmas present for my son who is starting to forge. It seems of great quality and I know he will love it!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Leather Apron
customer_reviews.text: Will work very well for me. It fits my large Fram. As far as comfort goes, well how comfortable can an Apron be? But it works well for forging.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Schmelz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. It was a gift, great fit and size.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage_lane

product_meta.title: QeeLink Leather Welding Apron - Heat & Flame-Resistant Heavy Duty Work Apron with 6 Pockets, 42" Extra Large & Cross Back Extra Long Strap, Adjustable M to XXXL Aprons for Men & Women (Brown)
product_meta.description:
About QeeLink Leather Apron
QeeLink Welding Aprons are made of thick real leather for maximum durability. Heavy duty leather can always keep fireproof by itself all its life. Other aprons rely on fire protection coating but it can not going to last. 
Invest in a rugged apron for your safety and reduce your worries. Our welding leather aprons are built to last.

Specification
Color: Brown
Material: Heavy cowhide split leather
Adjustable buckle fit for any body type
Size: 24 Inch x 42 Inch 
Stitched with fire resistant US Kevlar thread, it means more safe and durable 
6 pockets, portable and convenient . 

Features:
a) Simple and chic design style. Look professional. We pay attention to every detail, emphasis on quality. 
b)Sewing with strong, heat resistant US Kevlar thread. Double reinforced stitching on pockets and straps.
c)2x Metal grommets. It's convenient for you to hang things.
d)6 pockets for tools and work accessories. Include one cell phone pocket and one pencil pocket. Convenient pocket apron.
e)Cross-back (x-back) straps spread the weight of your apron and tools to prevent your neck strain. It makes you more comfortable at work.
f)Long straps make it fit for anyone.
g)Full coverage bib apron from upper chest to knees measure 24 inches wide x 42 inches tall.

Please Note:
Avoid Water: Leather tissue will swell with water, soft , resulting in deformation of apron. Please clean it with a little brush instead of soak in the water.
Avoid Roast: When apron is wet, should be placed in ventilated and dry place. It is a normal phenomenon that new leather aprons have taste but will reduce and softer after used a few days. You can place it in a ventilated places.
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR PROTECTION: Heat & Flame-Resistant heavy duty split cowhide leather welding apron. Extra Long ( 24 inches wide x 42 inches tall ) full coverage apron protect you until the knee when you are working.

MORE DURABLE: Made of thick split cowhide for durability. And it is wear & flame-resistant for protection from flame and spatter. Sewing with strong, heat resistant US Kevlar thread. We pay attention to every detail, emphasis on quality.
TOOL POCKETS: 6 pockets for tools and work accessories. Include one cell phone pocket and one pencil pocket. We offer customer great convenience as much as possible.

MULTI - FUNCTION. They are not only for welding but also useful for many other work and home tasks. Idea for tools apron vest, shop apron, utility apron, work apron, bbq apron, grilling apron, woodworkers apron, workshop apron, garage apron, lead apron, personalized apron, mechanics apron, machine apron, lathe work apron, metalwork apron, metalsmith apron, blacksmiths apron, gardening apron, pocket apron, bulk apron, farrier apron. Unique gift apron for men, women, mothers, fathers.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: If you're not COMPLETELY SATISFIED with our product, you will get a 100% COMPLETE REFUND.
